list.heading: Do I need to replot for joining the pool?
list.content: Yes. Any plots generated before the public pooling protocol release will be required to re-plot (original plots). The new plot generated after the pooling protocol update (End of May) is called portable plots.

list.heading: What about my current plots?
list.content: Your current plots can be used for solo farming and there is still a chance you can earn a block from your original plots. We recommend only replotting once you’re out of space and/or have extra compute power.

list.heading: Are my portable plots bound to a specific pool?
list.content: No. Your portable plots are not binding any pools. You can always switch pools.

list.heading: Do I need to pay to switch to the XCHscan Pool ?
list.content: Yes. It will require 1 mojo (1 trillionth of a XCH) to switch pools. The mojo is used to make a transaction with a smart contract on the blockchain. For those who don't have any XCH, you can get 100 mojos from Chia's official faucet: <0>https://faucet.chia.net</0>

list.heading: When will the XCHscan Chia Pool come online?
list.content: As soon as the Chia Network pool protocol announcement goes live. Currently scheduled for the 1st of June 2021.

list.heading: Do you really have the lowest fees ?
list.content: That’s correct. As of today, other Chia pools charge on average 1%. Are you aware of another pool charging less ? Drop us a message and we'll match it.
